caption:
Strawberry Coconut Sparkle – A Glam Galentine’s Mocktail (Recipe Below & in Bio)

  Valentine’s Day is literally around the corner, and what better way to celebrate than with a refreshing, mocktail with your girls?! 

  Strawberry Coconut Sparkle is the ultimate Galentine’s drink—light, sweet, and with a hint of zest, all while keeping the calories in check. Plus, the edible glitter makes it extra glamorous 💅🏾 

💕 Only 61-69 Calories per Glass! 💕

Ingredients

	•	1 can coconut cream (for rimming the glass + a touch inside the drink)
	•	Monk fruit sugar (for a naturally sweet rim)
	•	1 lime (sliced)
	•	Fresh strawberries (chopped)
	•	Humm Probiotic Kombucha BLUEBERRY MINT (or your favorite sparkling drink) @hummkombucha 
	•	Edible glitter (for that sparkle ✨)

Instructions

	1.	Rim the glass – Dip the rim of your glass into coconut cream, then coat it with monk fruit sugar for a sweet touch.
	2.	Muddle the fruit – In a glass or jar, mash together sliced lime and strawberries with a spoon to release their natural flavors. Stir in a small spoonful of coconut cream for a smooth, creamy balance.
	3.	Pour in the fizz – Add your choice of Humm Probiotic Kombucha or any sparkling drink you love.
	4.	Add the magic – Sprinkle a dash of edible glitter into the drink and stir gently for that extra shimmer.
	5.	Sip & Enjoy! – Gather your besties, toast to sisterhood, and enjoy your Strawberry Coconut Sparkle!

Cheers to love, friendship, and all the sparkle in between! ✨💖

Happy Galentine’s Day!
#kaysoplantbased #kaysogrand #hummkombucha #mocktail #galentinesday
